mapper.select: SELECT b.basketno, b.amount, o.optionno, o.sizes, o.color, s.shoesno, s.title, s.brand, s.price, s.discount, s.contents FROM basket b JOIN options o ON b.optionno = o.optionno JOIN shoes s ON o.shoesno = s.shoesno WHERE b.memberno = ${memberno}

SELECT b.basketno, b.amount FROM basket b INNER JOIN options o ON o.optionno = b.optionno INNER JOIN shoes s ON o.shoesno = s.shoesno INNER JOIN member m ON m.memberno = b.memberno WHERE color =#{color} AND sizes = #{sizes} AND s.shoesno = #{shoesno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basket(basketno, amount, memberno, optionno) SELECT basket_seq.nextval, #{amount}, #{memberno}, o.optionno FROM options o JOIN shoes s ON o.shoesno = s.shoesno WHERE o.color = #{color} AND o.sizes = #{sizes} AND s.shoesno = #{shoesno}
mapper.update: UPDATE options SET AMOUNT = AMOUNT - 1 WHERE OPTIONNO = #{optionNo}
UPDATE options SET AMOUNT = AMOUNT + 1 WHERE OPTIONNO = #{optionNo}
